Christine Hellen Amongin Aporu bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Teso Affairs n'ọfịs Praịm Minista na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 27 Mee na afo 2011. Ọ nọchitere anya Kumi District na Parliament dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị.
A mụrụ ya na Kumi District na 22 Mee na afo 1958
Ọ gara Nabuyanga Primary School na Soroti Secondary School

Aloysius Teachers College, na Ngora District, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Grade III Certificate in Teaching, na afo 1979. N'afọ 1986, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo, nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Education, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Makerere na afo 1996
O nwekwara diplọma postgraduate na Management site na Uganda Management Institute (UMI), nke enyere na afo 2005
O nwetara nzere masta ya na Human Resources Management na UMI n'afọ 2009.
Amongin Aporu malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na afo 1980, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo na afo 1984
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ITEK na afo 1986, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na kọleji ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo na afo 1996
A họpụtara ya na mbụ ka ọ nọchite anya Kumi District na afo 1996
N'agbata afọ 2001 na afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti
Ọ bụ onye otu Demobilization Resettlement Team nke Amnesty Commission, mgbe ọpụpụ nke LRA si n'ala Uganda
Mgbe ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2011 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke steeti maka ihe gbasara Teso.
